description: slightly abstracted image of two girls with greenish skin blowing blue bubbles through straws; bright colors; girl in LRC seen in profile from PL with bobbed brown hair, wearing a green blouse and holding a blue cup; girl in URC wears a black and red striped blouse and has long reddish brown hair; received attached with masking tape to faded dark rose-colored mat
title: Girls Blowing Bubbles
